mapper.select: SELECT T1.USER_ID, T1.USER_NAME, T1.USER_EMAIL, T1.IS_EMAIL_VERIFIED, T1.USER_PASSWORD, T1.USER_NICKNAME, T1.IMAGE_ID, T1.ROLE, T1.CREATED_DATE, T1.HAS_CHARACTER, ( SELECT T2.IMAGE_URL FROM TB_IMAGE T2 WHERE T2.CREATED_BY = T1.USER_ID AND T2.IMAGE_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY T2.IMAGE_ID DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS CHARACTER_IMG_URL FROM TB_USER T1 WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER ( USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, IS_EMAIL_VERIFIED, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NICKNAME, ROLE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, 'N', #{userPassword}, #{userNickname}, 'USER' )

mapper.select: SELECT T1.USER_ID, T1.USER_NAME, T1.USER_EMAIL, T1.IS_EMAIL_VERIFIED, T1.USER_PASSWORD, T1.USER_NICKNAME, T1.IMAGE_ID, T1.ROLE, T1.CREATED_DATE, T1.HAS_CHARACTER, T2.IMAGE_URL AS CHARACTER_IMG_URL FROM TB_USER T1 LEFT JOIN TB_IMAGE T2 ON T1.CHARACTER_ID = T2.IMAGE_ID WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}
